title: creating a ranked team
body: hi, im currently creating a ranked team and am looking for an adc and a top laner, the current group are all bronze so if you only care about what each players solo rank is and arent looking to help a team improve please dont respond

replies.body: hi everyone, just an update to this we are now looking for a jungler after a reshuffle

I'm keen on joining.
The teams I have played with in the past have averaged gold.

Main roles: Top/Mid
I'm up for it. I main all lanes and I'm currently Gold 3 but please tell me if your team is toxic because I actually want to be treated like a human.

top lane main

i don't give a sh.it about your ranks, i just need you all to be not toxic and try your best. 

add me if interested

hey im keen
just wanna play 5's
I main radc but can also play support and jungle. i'm keen to give a team a go. sick of solo q. i was silver 3 last season but bronze 2 this season due to feeders and dc'ers -.-
Hey, i'm silver 5 last season and would like to join if you're at least of the ages 17-18. I play mainly top but am able to play other roles.
i can answer for me and our mid we are both over 20, not sure on our support he only joined recently and top is a role we need so ill add you when i get home
sup man- im silver 2 and would love to join :)
